name: NFL Red Zone Rivals
description:
NFL Red Zone Rivals is an arcade-style football skill game designed around the most suspenseful part of the game: a Red Zone scoring drive! You'll compete by trying to score points as quickly as possible, picking up bonuses along the way for truly stellar performances. Rushing, passing, and kicking levels are presented in quick-hit fashion to minimize downtime and pack maximum action into a short-form competitive experience!

Choose your favorite NFL team and hit the gridiron, or you can play with a randomly-selected NFL team each game!

In NFL Red Zone Rivals, every play starts in the Red Zone, and the object is simply to SCORE! No need to worry about downs or timeouts — all the focus is on the action on the field. The game starts with 60 seconds on the clock, and the clock stops after each play.

Just like real football, NFL Red Zone Rivals requires a blend of strategy and quick thinking to succeed. In rush levels, you'll need to be able to read the defense in order to avoid defenders and reach the end zone. When passing, you'll to select an open receiver and execute a well-aimed throw to hit that receiver on the run, all before the blitz arrives to disrupt the play. For kick levels, perfect your aim and power on the kick, while taking into account the wind’s effect on the airborne football during its trajectory towards the goalpost!

Get ready for an action-packed arcade football experience! See you on the field!

• Please Note: Tournaments are available around the world, but real-prize tournaments are not available in the following states: Arizona, Arkansas, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Louisiana, Montana, South Carolina, South Dakota, Tennessee
• If you don't live in a region where real-prizes are available, you can still join the competition with our virtual currency tournaments.
